Title: An oracle inequality for quasi-Bayesian nonnegative matrix factorization
Abstract: © 2017, Allerton Press, Inc.The aim of this paper is to provide some theoretical understanding of quasi-Bayesian aggregation methods of nonnegative matrix factorization. We derive an oracle inequality for an aggregated estimator. This result holds for a very general class of prior distributions and shows how the prior affects the rate of convergence.
